banner.name: INTERIOR — YOUR INTERIOR IN ONE CLICK
banner.desc: Turn dreams of the perfect interior into reality in seconds. Get a personalized visualization of an inspiring space!

whyWe.name: WHY CHOOSE US?
whyWe.desc_item_0: Get your interior design in seconds after your request - fast, without waiting
whyWe.desc_item_1: AI adapts the design to your space, style and wishes - without banal templates
whyWe.desc_item_2: Upload a photo of your room and get an update option just for it
whyWe.desc_item_3: You don't need to invent complicated prompts, just describe what you want
whyWe.desc_item_4: Save the generated results in folders and quickly find what you need
whyWe.desc_item_5: Use your computer, phone or tablet, the interface is adapted to all devices

design_panel.title: STYLE GUIDE
design_panel.desc: Get to know popular design styles and choose the one that suits you!
design_panel.classic_desc: Exquisite shapes, symmetry, expensive materials, a restrained color palette. An atmosphere of elegance and eternal harmony.
design_panel.loft_desc: A style with character: open spaces, high ceilings, brick walls and metal accents. A feeling of freedom and urban spirit.
design_panel.provence_desc: Delicate pastel tones, light fabrics, floral motifs, wooden furniture. An atmosphere of comfort, romance and rustic charm.
design_panel.minimalism_desc: Space without excess, laconic forms, neutral colors, functionality. An atmosphere of peace, purity and harmony.
design_panel.contemporary_desc: Modern forms, simple lines, comfortable solutions, neutral palette. An atmosphere of lightness, style and functional aesthetics.
design_panel.modern_desc: Smooth lines, natural forms, glass, metal and wood. An atmosphere of elegance, style and sophisticated comfort.
design_panel.japanese_desc: Natural materials, clean lines, space and light. An atmosphere of calm, simplicity and harmony of nature.
design_panel.art_deco_desc: Geometric patterns, glossy surfaces, luxurious materials and shine. An atmosphere of glamour, elegance and confident style.
design_panel.mediterranean_desc: Warm colors, natural materials, open spaces and greenery. An atmosphere of freshness, sunlight and sea breeze.
design_panel.eco_style_desc: Natural materials, greenery, minimalism. Simplicity, environmental friendliness and harmony with nature. An atmosphere of purity and renewal.
design_panel.high_tech_desc: Innovative materials, technological solutions, minimalism and clear lines. An atmosphere of the future, functionality and modern comfort.
design_panel.scandinavian_desc: Natural materials, light colors, simplicity and functionality. An atmosphere of warmth, comfort and harmony with nature.

roadMap.title: HOW TO GENERATE A DESIGN?
roadMap.desc_item_0: Add a photo of the room to create a personal design.
roadMap.desc_item_1: Select the type of room from the list, style, write a simple prompt and click the “Generate” button.
roadMap.desc_item_2: Wait a few seconds and get a picture of the generated space according to your request.
roadMap.desc_item_3: Download to your phone or computer or save the finished interior on the site in separate folders. Feel free to share with your friends.

gallery.title: INSPIRATION GALLERY
gallery.desc: Get inspired by ideas from those who have already created their own design
gallery.first: A modern living room with large panoramic windows, a wooden ceiling, and warm lighting. The room should feature a large gray sofa with soft cushions in warm tones (yellow, beige, brown), a cozy rug, and a low coffee table. In the background, there is a modern kitchen with dark cabinetry and stylish lighting.
gallery.second: A modern Scandinavian-style kitchen with eco-design elements. The spacious room features high ceilings, light wooden floors, and panoramic windows. The kitchen cabinets are white, and the island has a stone countertop with a wooden base, complemented by woven bar stools. A copper pendant lamp, a vase with a green branch, minimalist accessories, and a cozy atmosphere complete the look.
gallery.third: A modern bedroom in contemporary style with minimalist elements. The design features calm, neutral tones—grey, white, and beige. The wall behind the headboard is adorned with a large monochrome forest landscape panel. Clean lines, sleek furniture shapes, built-in lighting, and the symmetrical placement of light fixtures create an atmosphere of tranquility, harmony, and modern comfort.
gallery.fourth: A modern, cozy minimalist-style bedroom. The room features a low, soft bed with beige bedding and numerous pillows, a wooden wall panel with backlighting, bedside tables, a chair by the window, and light curtains. The atmosphere is calm, warm, and relaxing. The lighting is soft and warm, with spotlights and wall lamps.
gallery.fifth: A modern loft-style living room with a minimalist approach. A textured grey concrete wall, a large low sofa with warm-toned cushions, soft neon lighting, two round metal coffee tables, and a large potted indoor plant. Panoramic windows with blinds, light curtains, and a cozy atmosphere in an urban apartment.
gallery.sixth: A modern kitchen in a contemporary style with neoclassical elements. The kitchen features light paneled cabinet fronts, a marble backsplash and countertop, and symmetrically placed pendant globe lamps. The room is decorated in a warm beige and cream color palette with wooden accents on the floor and furniture. A central kitchen island is complemented by tall bar stools. The interior is enhanced with elegant décor and live plants.
gallery.seventh: A modern-style kitchen with a large island. The kitchen features sleek grey cabinetry, a light stone countertop, and a marble backsplash. Lighting is provided by stylish black pendant lamps, and the interior is designed in a calm color palette. Elegant chairs with soft seats are placed around the island. The atmosphere is understated, modern, and functional.
gallery.eighth: A romantic and bright Provence-style living room with natural lighting, white walls with classic moldings, a soft white sofa with pastel cushions, a large floral painting, blooming potted trees, gold wall sconces, a round wooden table with peonies, a neutral rug, and herringbone parquet flooring.
gallery.ninth: A bathroom in a modern style with minimalist elements. The interior is based on natural beige tones and warm wood. One wall is decorated with marble cladding, and above the sink hangs a large round backlit mirror. The sanitary fixtures feature a contemporary design with matte black faucets, while the decorative elements include dried flowers and scented candles.
gallery.tenth: A modern loft-style bathroom with luxury elements. The walls and floor are clad in marble tiles in grey and brown tones. It features a wall-mounted toilet, a shower with a clear glass partition, and gold fixtures. Wooden cabinets with open shelving, soft ambient lighting, and a stylish rectangular sink complete the look. The atmosphere is modern, elegant, and refined.
gallery.eleventh: A modern living room combined with a home office, designed in a high-tech style with minimalist elements. The room features a muted color palette of grey and dark blue tones. The space is divided by transparent glass partitions, adding a sense of lightness. In the foreground, there is a soft modular sofa, a white coffee table with fruit, and green live plants in the corners of the room. A concrete wall and large windows with long curtains add to the design. Lighting is provided by modern recessed and track fixtures. In the background, a workspace with a computer is seamlessly integrated into the overall interior. The atmosphere is restrained, modern, and functional.
gallery.twelfth: A modern minimalist kitchen featuring a concrete kitchen island with built-in LED lighting, tall bar stools with slim black legs and wooden seats. The space includes white glossy handleless cabinets, a black accent wall, a minimalist faucet and sink, and a small green plant in a glass vase. The lighting is dimmed, creating a stylish and understated atmosphere. The color scheme consists of dark grey, black, and white tones, evoking a nighttime interior.

comment.title: Comments
comment.desc_item_comment_0: I am not a design professional, but thanks to this platform I was able to create an interior for my apartment that truly reflects my preferences. It is incredibly simple - I just indicated my wishes, and the result was exactly as I imagined. Many thanks for such a convenient and intuitive tool!
comment.desc_item_comment_1: This platform has greatly simplified the process of creating a design. Thanks to a variety of templates and the ability to customize each element, I was able to easily visualize my ideal interior. A truly convenient tool for anyone who wants to get results quickly!
comment.desc_item_comment_2: I was amazed at how easy it is to work with the platform! It allows you to experiment with different styles and colors without spending a lot of time. This is a real helper for creating a unique interior without professional skills.

generate.mainWindowDesc: Display or change your exterior design for a limited time. Just upload a photo or sketch and watch the magic in action.
generate.mainWindowAdvance_0: Upload an image of your design
generate.mainWindowAdvance_2: Select the style and type of room
generate.mainWindowAdvance_1: Write a prompt, describe what you want to achieve. Describe colors or other details

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How does the interior design generator work?
faq.a1: Our generator uses powerful artificial intelligence algorithms to create unique interior designs based on your wishes. Choose a style, room type, upload a photo of your room and the system will automatically generate a visualization of your space.
faq.q2: What is a prompt and how to write one?
faq.a2:
A prompt is your task or request to the design generator (for example, to create an image, text, or explain something). To get a good result, you should clearly and clearly describe what you want. Here are some tips on how to write a successful prompt:
  1. Write simply and specifically. Instead of “draw something beautiful,” it is better to: “create an image of a cozy room with a wooden floor, light walls, and a large window.”
  2. Add details. The more details (colors, style, emotions, time of day, etc.) — the more accurate the result.
  3. Don't be afraid to try! If the result doesn't suit you the first time — change or clarify your request. That's okay.
faq.q3: Can I use the platform without registering?
faq.a3: No, to access all the platform's features, you need to register. Registration allows you to save your designs, access personalized settings. You can register via email or social networks.
faq.q4: Where are my generated images stored?
faq.a4: All generated designs are stored on our platform in your personal profile. You can access your images at any time and download them to your device.
faq.q5: Is there a limit on the number of designs created?
faq.a5: The number of designs created depends on the selected tariff plan. For the free plan, there is a limit on the number of generated images, while for paid plans more options are available. You can check the pricing details on our pricing page.
faq.q6: How can I change my pricing plan?
faq.a6: You can change your pricing plan at any time by going to the 'My Account' section and selecting the appropriate option. The change in pricing will be applied instantly without any interruption in the platform's use.
faq.q7: Can I change the design after it has been created?
faq.a7: Yes, you can edit the created design at any time, changing the style or other parameters to achieve the desired result.

terms.text1: By using our service, you agree to the terms outlined below. Thank you for choosing INTERIOR — a platform that provides image creation services powered by artificial intelligence. We use AI models to generate interior photos and grant access to these resources to registered users.
terms.text2:
• To use the Platform, you must create an account by providing your name and a valid email address.
  • We care about the security of your personal data and do not share it with third parties without your consent.
  • You are also responsible for maintaining the security of your account access (e.g., not sharing your password with others). All activity on your account will be considered as performed by you. If you notice anything unusual, we recommend changing your password for safety.
terms.text3:
You may upload photos of your rooms only if you have the rights to do so.
It is prohibited to upload images that contain:
  • personal data of third parties
  • copyrighted content without permission
  • violence, pornography, discrimination, or other inappropriate material.
We reserve the right to remove such content and/or suspend the account.
terms.text4: Generations are created automatically using AI and may be inaccurate or imperfect. You agree not to use the generated materials for commercial purposes without permission, unless otherwise specified in your subscription plan.
terms.text5: Users of INTERIOR can upload and store photos created using our services. Images created by users may temporarily appear on the community page, where we showcase the latest interior examples. Some of these may also be used on other INTERIOR pages to showcase interesting and successful examples of using our service.
terms.text6:
All functionality, design, and technology of the Platform are the property of INTERIOR.
  • You retain the rights to the images you upload.
  • We may use your generated images for internal service improvement or in the examples gallery.
If you violate any of our Terms of Service, your right to use our Service may be immediately terminated.
terms.text7: At INTERIOR, we strive to ensure our users feel confident in their purchasing decisions. To help you explore our services, we offer free credits for preview before purchase. Therefore, all purchases are final, and we do not offer refunds after the transaction is completed.
terms.text8:
The platform is provided 'as is.'
  • We do not guarantee uninterrupted operation or perfect results from the generations.
  • We do not guarantee that any resources created by our AI service will be suitable for any particular purpose.
terms.text9:
We strive to make the service as reliable as possible, but INTERIOR is not liable for any losses or inconveniences that may arise during the use of the platform or due to technical failures.
  • You agree to use the platform at your own risk.
  • In the event of a breach of these terms on your part, you agree not to file any claims against INTERIOR and to compensate for any potential damages, if any arise.
terms.text10:
INTERIOR reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time.
  • Users will be notified of any significant changes to these terms via email or on the website.
  • Continued use of INTERIOR after such changes are made constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. All changes take effect from the moment they are published on the website.

policy.text1: At INTERIOR, we understand the importance of protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and store your information when you use our services.
policy.text2:
• Name and email during registration
  • Room photos that you upload
  • Selected styles, prompts, and other data related to generation
  • IP address, browser, language — for analytics and security purposes.
policy.text3:
• To provide interior generation services
  • To personalize the user experience
  • To improve the performance of the Platform
  • To send technical or informational notifications
  • We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties.
policy.text4: Only the INTERIOR team has access to your data for the purpose of system maintenance.</br>In case we use third-party services (e.g., hosting, analytics), your data may be shared with them, ensuring security measures are in place.
policy.text5: We take the security of your personal information seriously and use industry-standard measures to protect your data.</br> We regularly review and update our security practices as needed to ensure the best possible protection of your data.
policy.text6: You can request full access to your data. You can withdraw your consent for data processing at any time.
policy.text7: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide the services.</br>You can submit a request for the complete deletion of your data.
policy.text8: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our business practices or to comply with legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes to our Privacy Policy via email or through our website.
policy.text9: We use cookies to enhance your experience with our website and services. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. We use cookies to remember your settings, improve website performance, and provide personalized content. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect your experience on our website.
